root.name: theory
Psychoanalysis and the communist movement
root.description:
http://en.internationalism.org/ir/140/the-legacy-of-freud

This is the article on Freud published on the ICC website. As the introduction points out, this is a contribution to debate and not a positional document of the ICC. All considered comments welcome. In this case, it may be useful to say that I am the author of the article.
root.creator: Alf
root.name: Visions of the future?
root.description: This thread is a split from http://libcom.org/forums/theory/my-vision-socialist-society-06022010, at Steven.'s request.
root.creator: BigLittleJ
root.name: Killing soldiers in war is now a crime
root.description:
BBC wrote:
Eight Iraqis have been arrested over the deaths of six Royal Military Police officers in 2003, the BBC has learned.

root.creator: Joseph Kay
root.name: General Synod says religion and science not mutually exclusive
root.description:
General Synod says religion and science not mutually exclusive?

Discuss.
root.creator: blackrainbow
root.name: Critiques of "democracy"
root.description: Maybe I'm just thick or a democracy fetishist but I don't really get the point of them. Firstly, going on about how you're opposed to "democracy" will make you sound like some kind of totalitarian vanguardist to the uninitiated - but that's really an issue of how you present yourself to the outside world, not a problem with the critiques of democracy.
root.name: hunting for quote - German left communist? - on party
root.description:
Hiya, quick question. I seem to remember a quote, I think by Gorter or someone like that, which goes something like, "in the last analysis, every political party, every soviet, every union, is a party for or against the revolution". I can't find it using Google. Can anyone help?

Thanks.
root.creator: posi
root.name: The economy.
root.description: One thing I've wondered is how the economy would run under a worker-managed society. If, based on the council models, socially owned enterprises exist at a local level, does this mean businesses won't be able to set up branches in other parts of the country, much less at an international scale? How would trade between other businesses and countries be conducted?
root.creator: appledoze
root.name: How would we deal with/ what would happen if something clearly wrong was democratically voted for?
root.description: Just wondering how in an anarchist communist society we would deal with say a workers/community council that democratically voted to do something clearly wrong, like say something racist, sexist etc
root.creator: D
root.name: Community/workplace struggles and Just Transition
root.creator: woooo
root.name: My vision of a socialist society.
root.description: As some of you may have noticed one of my earlier threads involved me trying to find a schematic/chart of how the council system of early Soviet Russia worked.
root.creator: appledoze
root.name: The Question of Parasitism Letter (edited) to Ingram of March 1996 recalling the ICC 1981 burglaries against oppositionists
root.description: ... The other day I was reflecting on one of the ICC raids of 1981. It was the second raid on my flat. From the top window, through the curtains, I saw three cars arrive and carefully park in front of the building. It was a dark, cold early evening. The lights in the flat had been turned off. Kl and I were in. Waiting. We knew they would return.
root.creator: mciver
root.name: Would business exist?
root.description: Can business exist in an anrachist society?
root.creator: The Outlaw
root.name: Anarchism today?
root.description:
could you tell me/show me/explain to me how exactly anarchism would work in the contemporary uk?

I mean practically work and are there any anarchist communities in the world?
root.creator: The Outlaw
root.name: World Civil War
root.description: This was taken from the Institute for Experimental Freedom blog
root.creator: liam sionnach
root.name: An end to "positive" freedom?
root.description:
I take it anarchism doesn't agree with positive freedom, so after the glorious Revolution will their be an end to it, in favour of "negative" freedom.

I hate the term negative and positive and are obviously set up to give people negative connotations with negative freedom.

Positive freedom: Interferance in someones life for their own good/wellbeing e.g the smoking ban
root.creator: The Outlaw
